mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lol_board ORDER BY cast(CASE #{sort} WHEN '최신순' THEN IDX WHEN '조회순' THEN HIT_CNT WHEN '추천순' THEN RECOMMEND END as signed integer) DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lol_board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_CHK, CREA_ID, RECOMMEND ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', #{CREA_ID}, 0 );

INSERT INTO lol_file ( BOARD_IDX, ORG_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_ID, CREA_DATE, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{ BOARD_IDX}, #{ ORG_FILE_NAME}, #{ SAVE_FILE_NAME}, #{ FILE_SIZE}, #{ CREA_ID}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() );
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ORG_FILE_NAME, SAVE_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM lol_file WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{IDX};
mapper.update: UPDATE lol_board SET HIT_CNT = HIT_CNT + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX};
UPDATE lol_board SET RECOMMEND = RECOMMEND + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX};
